> egg-scripts start --title=qtuminfo-api --sticky --daemon

[egg-scripts] Starting egg application at /data/qtuminfo-api
[egg-scripts] Run node /data/qtuminfo-api/node_modules/egg-scripts/lib/start-cluster {"title":"qtuminfo-api","sticky":true,"baseDir":"/data/qtuminfo-api","framework":"/data/qtuminfo-api/node_modules/egg"} --title=qtuminfo-api
[egg-scripts] Save log file to /root/logs
[egg-scripts] Wait Start: 1...
[egg-scripts] Wait Start: 2...
[egg-scripts] Wait Start: 3...
[egg-scripts] egg started on http://127.0.0.1:7001

# 验证
curl localhost:7001/info

qtuminfo-ui
cd /data/
git clone https://github.com/qtumproject/qtuminfo-ui.git
cd qtuminfo-ui && npm install

reverse proxy
server {
    listen 80;
    listen [::]:80;
    server_name qinfo.hashquark.net;
    location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:3000;
        proxy_redirect off;
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
        proxy_set_header X_Real_IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Nginx-Proxy true;
    }
    location /api/ {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:7001;
        proxy_redirect off;
        proxy_set_header Host \$host;
        proxy_set_header X_Real_IP \$remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For \$proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header X-Nginx-Proxy true;
    }

    access_log /var/log/nginx/qtum.info.access.log;
    error_log /var/log/nginx/qtum.info.error.log;
}

iris.html.title: IRISnet
iris.html.body:
Requirements

ubuntu16.04+ 
2 Core CPU or above
8G Memory or above
300G Storage or above
10Mbit/s bandwidth or above
NTP service on
go1.12.5+

Setup Guide
Install go and iris
mkdir -p $HOME/go/bin
echo "export GOPATH=$HOME/go" >> ~/.bashrc
echo "export GOBIN=$GOPATH/bin" >> ~/.bashrc
echo "export PATH=$PATH:$GOBIN" >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc
git clone --branch  https://github.com/irisnet/irishub
cd irishub
make get_tools install

Init Your Node
iris init --moniker= --home= --chain-id=
cd /config/
rm genesis.json
rm config.toml
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/irisnet/mainnet/master/config/genesis.json
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/irisnet/mainnet/master/config/config.toml
Edit Your Config File
You could customize the moniker and external_address fields.
A custom human readable name for this node
moniker = ""
external_address = ":26656"
Optional: Set addr_book_strict to false to make peering more easily.
addr_book_strict = false
Add Seed Nodes
Your node needs to know how to find more peers. You'll need to add healthy seed nodes to /config/config.toml. Here are some seed nodes you can use:
6a6de770deaa4b8c061dffd82e9c7f4d40c2165d@seed-1.mainnet.irisnet.org:26656
a17d7923293203c64ba75723db4d5f28e642f469@seed-2.mainnet.irisnet.org:26656
Enable Port
Enable Port
You will need to set 26656 port to get connected with other peers and 26657 to query information of Tendermint.
Run a Full Node
Start the full node with this command:
nohup iris start --home= > iris.log &

Check that everything is running smoothly:
iriscli status

start light-client
nohup irislcd start --node=tcp://localhost:26657 --laddr=tcp://0.0.0.0:1317 --chain-id=irishub --home=/home/iris/.iriscli/ --trust-node > irislcd.log 2>&1 &
Refer to related articles
https://www.irisnet.org/docs/software/How-to-install-irishub.html
https://www.irisnet.org/docs/get-started/Full-Node.html
https://www.irisnet.org/docs/light-client/

mkdir -p /data/tron/logs

docker run -it --rm -p 9090:9090 --name tron  -v /data/tron/logs:/tron/FullNode/logs -v /data/tron/output-directory:/tron/FullNode/output-directory -e "defaultBalance=100000" -e "showQueryString=true" -e "showBody=true" -e "formatJson=true" trontools/quickstart

Refer to related articles
https://cn.developers.tron.network/docs/full-node

kusama.html.title: Polkadot
kusama.html.body:
Getting Started

ubuntu16.04+ 
2 Core CPU or above
8G Memory or above
300G Storage or above
10Mbit/s bandwidth or above
NTP service on

Setup Guide
Install Rust and "Kusama" Canary Network
curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh
sudo apt install make clang pkg-config libssl-dev
rustup update
git checkout 
./scripts/init.sh
cargo build --release

Run a Full Node
nohup ./target/release/polkadot > ./polkadot.log 2>&1 &
Refer to related articles
https://github.com/paritytech/polkadot
https://telemetry.polkadot.io/
https://guide.kusama.network

blockstack.html.title: Blockstack
blockstack.html.body:
Blockstack

Blockstack链是一条基于Bitcoin链的的区块链,它通过解析Bitcoin的区块,查找属于blockstack链的交易,在一笔交易达到7个或更多区块确认之后,记录在自己的区块中.
Blockstack链发送一笔STX转账的原理 是类似于USDT的. 其会发送一笔拥有特殊OP_RETURN指令的交易到BTC链上,Blockstack链会后续进行解析处理.
Blockstack发送交易产生的手续费是BTC

Blockstack在Jadepool Hub的实现

Blockstack链作为单独的一条链存在于 Jadepool Hub中
Blockstack链需与BTC链配合使用. 
Blockstack下有两个子币种. 主币种:STX,  子币种:STXBTC (用来计Fee)
STXBTC子币种唯一的作用是 STX交易消耗Fee的计量单位 (实际记录的是使用BTC的数量),不实现其他任何功能.
Blockstack链与Bitcoin链是会共用热主地址的. 在此前提下,它就可以使用BTC热主地址上的utxo来发送STX的交易, 最终Blockstack链会将交易产生的fee变相的以STXBTC为单位记录在自己的订单中
此实现背景下, 'BTC链中实际余额' 是会比 'BTC链统计后理论余额' 少的. (被STX交易消耗了)
统计须知: BTC链中实际余额 = BTC链统计后理论余额 - STX币种统计中STXBTC fee的总额

使用注意事项

BTC链热主地址需保证有足够的余额,用来支持STX发送交易
Blockstack链中需要同时配置Bitcoin节点和Blockstack节点.
STXBTC子币种禁止关闭.  

STXBTC在 Jadepool Hub 默认为开启的, 为了STX币种能够正常运行,禁止将STXBTC币种关闭


Blockstack与BTC链需要同时启用.

如果BTC链不启用,将导致无法正常生成找零订单 以及无法扫描到DUST入账订单,最终导致BTC的统计账单无法平账.(这里的找零订单,DUST入账订单都是Blockstack链运行时产生的)


充值汇总到热主地址的阈值需要被合理设置

由于STX转账使用的是BTC作为手续费,其转账代价比较大,需根据实际情况设置阈值


交易确认机制问题.

由于Blockstack链延迟7个或更多区块确认之后,才将Bitcoin链上交易解析到其自身区块信息中, Jadepool Hub中的订单发出后,会存在Bitcoin浏览器中可以找到此交易,但是Blockstack 浏览器无法找到此交易的情况. 所以如果想要确认一笔订单真的上链失败了,需要确认在Bitcoin浏览器中无法查找到此交易.


BTC与STX并发大量提现订单时,存在小概率订单holding.

由于共用热地址,造成utxo同时被重复使用,导致上链失败,订单则holding



BTC地址与STX地址转换方法

根据 https://github.com/blockstack/cli-blockstack Readme中指引安装cli工具
Requirements

Node.js v8 or higher (v10 recommended).
nvm is recommended for MacOS & Linux users to avoid sudo or permissions problems.

Install the CLI
$ npm install -g https://github.com/blockstack/cli-blockstack

到这里,我们可以在命令行中在BTC与STX地址中做转换

具体为blockstack-cli -t convert_address ADDRESS  其中 -t 代表测试网地址, ADDRESS既可以为BTC地址,又可以为STX地址.


生成地址的命令

 'blockstack-cli -t make_keychain'  可以生成一套地址



节点安装部署
Requirements

ubuntu16.04+
nodejs v8
2 Core CPU or above
4G Memory or above
30G Storage or above
NTP service on
nodejs v8+

install
install btc regtest and jion blockstack regtest
useradd -m -r bitcore
su - bitcore
curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.33.8/install.sh | bash
nvm install v8
npm install bitcore -g
bitcore create 
cd 
bitcore install insight-api insight-ui

Setup Bitcore config

Example bitcore-node.json

```json
{
  "network": "regtest",
  "port": 3001,
  "services": [
    "bitcoind",
    "insight-api",
    "insight-ui",
    "web"
  ],
  "servicesConfig": {
    "insight-api": {
      "disableRateLimiter": true
    },
    "bitcoind": {
      "spawn": {
        "datadir": "./data",
        "exec": "/home/bitcore/.nvm/versions/node//lib/node_modules/bitcore/node_modules/bitcore-node/bin/bitcoind"
      }
    }
  }
}
```



Example bitcore-node.json

```
$ cat  ~//data/bitcoind.conf
regtest=1
server=1
rpcbind=[0.0.0.0:18332](http://0.0.0.0:18332/)
rpcuser=blockstack
rpcpassword=blockstacksystem
txindex=1
listen=1
rpcserialversion=0
EOF
```


Start Bitcore
nohup bitcored  > bitcored.log 2>&1 &

blockstack regtest explorer
https://testnet.blockstack.org/
blockstack live
install btc live and  blockstack live
